item.title: Bash
item.description: script ## sum with awk awk '{sum += $2} END {print sum}' ## ls sort by file size ls -lh . --sort=size ## cut first field command | cut -f 1 -d '=' ## cut seconds until last fields command | cut -f 2- -d '=' ## git git config --global https.proxy http://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global https.proxy https://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global http.proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global https.proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global --unset http.
